Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Randolph/Stetson
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker due to, street blockage near Randolph/Stetson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker due to, street blockage near Randolph/Stetson.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Ferdinand
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Ferdinand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Ferdinand.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Randolph/Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Randolph, Michigan, Lake, Wabash, and Wacker due to, street blockage near Randolph/Stetson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Randolph, Michigan, Lake, Wabash, and Wacker due to, street blockage near Randolph/Stetson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
